website_summaries.verdict: Another extra-large beer pong float offering lasting durability alongside helpful features.
pros: Crafted from extra-thick, scratch- and tear-resistant material
Holds up to 28 cups as well as pong balls
Can be used as a pool float
cons: Deflates more easily than other models

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Ok as brief as can be It leaked the day I got it. The company’s only response was you got a repair kit, Fix it ! For $33 I don’t think I should have to do that the first day it get it. Not made up to the quality that I expected for the cost!
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Huge Pool Party Hit!
customer_reviews.text: Want to get the party started? Bring this out and its on like Donkey Kong! Young and Old alike enjoyed playing beer pong in the last two pool parties I hosted. Inflates easily with my air compressor (Don't attempt to do it manually!), seems to be sturdy enough construction, so far no leaks and its been used quite heavily. Not using it for the float option - just the beer pong table option. If your pool parties aren't any fun, get one of these and kick them up a notch! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler13

customer_reviews.title: Received defective
customer_reviews.text: One of the cup holes was cut incorrectly, it was visibly too small for the cup. Jamming a cup in there didn't really work. This obviously was detrimental to the whole operation and had to be sent back. Seller only had option for refund when returning, else I would have given it another chance. I will try another brand next.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Shackleford

customer_reviews.title: Holes too far apart
customer_reviews.text: It works Fine and is aa advertised. The shipping was fast. The only problem is that the holes for the cups are too far apart. There is maybe an inch or more between the top of the cups when using red solo cups which makes the game much more difficult. I have played on other inflatable tables that do not have this problem and would recommend purchasing a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Cool product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool product, I mean, you can take it to the pool, the lake, the beach... or like I did with my friend on a boring night, play it in the living room! haha Obviously if you play it on "dry land" it's going to be a little bit more of a pain because when the ping pong balls hit the "table" they bounce all over the place, so being in a body of water helps keep them close since they won't hit the ground and bounce away. Needless to say, we had a blast!! It's beer pong... you kinda know you're going to have fun ;)
customer_reviews.author: Raquel P.

customer_reviews.title: This float is horrible!! It doesn't hold air and hasn't since ...
customer_reviews.text: This float is horrible!! It doesn't hold air and hasn't since the first inflation. Additionally, you cannot return it via Amazon! Worst purchase I have ever made on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: John Gessman

customer_reviews.title: Came with holes
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box this float came with 3 holes. Very disappointed as I did not open prior to when I needed to test it out.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: e inches apart on the table but still a very fun game to have around if you like this game ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent Table. High quality material. Biggest complaint would be how spread out the cups are making it quite a difficult game because cups are always a coup,e inches apart on the table but still a very fun game to have around if you like this game and like swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Jumbo757&Becca

customer_reviews.title: Holes are too far apart
customer_reviews.text: So hard to score because the whole are far apart! It would’ve been better if they just left one triangle to put all the cups together instead of separate holes. Did not enjoy
customer_reviews.author: R.S

customer_reviews.title: Got it for Cabo and left it there.
customer_reviews.text: It worked well enough for a pool party and that is why I got it. It works. enough said
customer_reviews.author: Mister Meep

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Unfortunately didn’t get a chance to use it. Our loving shepherd dog tore a nice hole in the side while we were cleaning the pool. Will order a replacement soon.
customer_reviews.author: T. Keplinger

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt Hold Air
customer_reviews.text: Keeps loosing air - I have filled it 4 times and a day later its deflated enough that I need to fill it again. Very fun game, we all love it, just wish it was built better
customer_reviews.author: anthony hearn

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Very fun
customer_reviews.text: So much fun!! It looks exactly as pictured and works great! The material is quite thick so not too worried that it'll get punctured easily. I love that it comes with the ping pong balls and materials to patch a hole if one does happen.
customer_reviews.author: Jen khan

customer_reviews.title: White girl wasted float
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a pool party. As expected it was a hit. Very durable in the water and acts nicely as a cup holder while you swim. Everyone couldn't wait to get in the pool and get white girl wasted playing beer pong
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: This raft wouldn't inflate all the way! Definitely not ...
customer_reviews.text: This raft wouldn't inflate all the way! Definitely not worth the purchase as we could hardly use it to play pong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and obviously a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Love my pool beer pong and it’s alwats the hit of any pool party.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy C.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: the space between the cups is not like the normal game, but is well made
customer_reviews.author: dogowner

customer_reviews.title: Sweet summertime
customer_reviews.text: This was the staple of our summer. We never took the boat out without it, and had people flock to us to play. Sturdy and floats well. Forgot the electric pump a couple times, yet still wasn't CRAZY hard to blow up using the ole lungs. Cup holders are reinforced well and the additional side drink holders are nice when in need of a refill (which I DON'T recommend doing in lake water, BTW... Just shew). Much better quality than any others we've seen.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica T

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one. It's great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. We use it often and it even comes with ping pong balls. Stays inflated, sturdy, and well worth it! The extra cup holders on the side are great. Much better than the versions you see in Target/Dicks
customer_reviews.author: Cayce C.

customer_reviews.title: Play platoon doesn’t hold air cause of ripped seams
customer_reviews.text: Had holes in it. Couldn’t inflate while on vacation in Mexico
customer_reviews.author: karen liscom

customer_reviews.title: good packaging, filled it up with a compressor
customer_reviews.text: arrived on time, good packaging, filled it up with a compressor, played in the lake...just be careful of the water mixing with the beer. but the product is solid.
customer_reviews.author: Jim H.

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it's great. Not good for bouncing though
customer_reviews.text: Didn't consider the fact that the cups are spaced from each other. Other than that it's great. Not good for bouncing though. It's great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome addition to our pool. Only wish the cup holders were closer together. Great quality other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: What a great idea, I love it
customer_reviews.text: What a great idea, I love it! It is made of a very thick vinyl so I believe it will be worth every cent :-) Delivered quickly as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Santos

customer_reviews.title: great for pool parties.
customer_reviews.text: It is wide enough to be a very comfortable body float as well as a beer pong table. I have had many people ask me where they can buy it too!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: The box came banged up
customer_reviews.text: The box came banged up and I am giving this product as a gift so that sucks. Hopefully, the raft works well. I guess we will find out in the Spring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable water fun with no mess to clean up!
customer_reviews.text: Brought this to a family reunion. It was a big hit!
customer_reviews.author: Laura A.

customer_reviews.title: Cup holder deformity
customer_reviews.text: This product came with one of the cupholders slightly deformed. This wouldn’t be an issue, but because of the deformity, it had a hole in that deformity. Disappointing for the amount of money it cost.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Michael

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tough - durable - very well made - super fun
customer_reviews.author: Robin West

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Great idea poor quality deflated within 24 hours on first use
customer_reviews.author: Dr M.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: fun, kids wish the cups were closer like in table pong, but still fun in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: I felt like I was back in college
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a recent vacation to Mexico, and it quickly became the hit of the pool at our resort. I think over the course of a week I played 30 games of Beirut, and my kids loved using it too (though obviously not with beer in the cups). It also is a well crafted raft. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Sebell

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is my second float- we loved the first one so much that we bought one to take on vacation!
customer_reviews.author: Ronda S. Toole

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! So much fun! Fast shipping and no problems with leaking!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I look forward to playing this in our pool this summer!!

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Had a lot of fun using this product this summer in the pool!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a great weekend addition in the pool.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Used for an entire weekend. Construction was solid. Bonus of 4’ping pong balls. Would highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: This is such a fun float/game. When my kids friends are swimming in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun float/game. When my kids friends are swimming in our pool, they fight over it. This year we bought one for each of our four kids so there will not be any more fighting. Shipped quickly!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun, good quality, bigger than what you can get in stores!

customer_reviews.text: It is a great float! Perfect size and lots of fun! It was suppose to come with ping pong balls but didn't.

customer_reviews.text: Float was good. But did not come with the 5 balls that are marketed to come with it.

customer_reviews.title: I inflated this with the hopes of playing beer pong ...
customer_reviews.text: I inflated this with the hopes of playing beer pong and it holds aid for 20 minutes and deflates filling with water.

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: works great as a pong table and a raft
customer_reviews.text: works great as a pong table and a raft. seams seem strong and comes with a patch kit just in case.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Works as advertised. Balls are a thicker plastic and slightly textured which adapts very well to outdoor pool pong.

customer_reviews.title: Fun product
customer_reviews.text: My friends enjoyed it last summer and we will again this summer! Inflated just fine and all red solo cups fit perfectly I'm the holes.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome For the Pool
customer_reviews.text: This float works great for Pool Beer Pong. We've had lots of fun playing. I've had it for several months and it's held up great.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend this can't wait to try out some more water toys
customer_reviews.text: Fun fun fun this game has been the biggest hit in our pool and on our lake at The Sandbar all the boats around us what everyone wants to join in the fun and play

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a good price. Just wanted something simple to use on the lake, this is just what we were looking for. Plus, it makes a great float for a person when not using for pong :)

customer_reviews.title: Great on the Bay
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my husbands birthday to take out on our boat. Works great and we had a lot of fun. Nice having extra cup holders for our drinks too!

customer_reviews.title: I would give this zero stars if I could. ...
customer_reviews.text: I would give this zero stars if I could. It does not hold air very long, cheaply made. DO NOT BUY THIS! It was useless at the party. Spend the extra $10 and get another one.

customer_reviews.title: Great!

customer_reviews.title: So complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: First time I used it found out it has a hole in a very awkward spot, making a patch not effective. So complete waste of money. It was fun for about 5 minutes after blowing it up, until all the air came right back out. It's been too long after purchase so I can't return it.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a pool party and it worked beautifully. Just as described! When you put air into the air intake hole the air doesn't release back out due to a valve allowing the air to remain inside the float which is really convenient to have. Additionally more than enough Cup holes are provided for the game as well as for additional drinks. The cup holes had a tight fit for a regular sized sole cup. This was perfect because the cups stayed in place throughout the game. This was the highlight of the pool party great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sally Wip

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful idea and made with top quality
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful idea and made with top quality, however, it is very difficult to shoot. The cups are separated far enough where every cup is an "Island shot".
customer_reviews.author: Nick V.

customer_reviews.title: had so much fun. it could not be better
customer_reviews.text: Played it in the pool all weekend. Won all five games I played. had so much fun. it could not be better. Everyone who was here wanted to know where I got it and how to order it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

product_meta.title: Play Platoon H2PONG Inflatable Beer Pong Raft, Includes 5 Ping Pong Balls - Floating Pool Party Game Float Set
feature_bullets: INCLUDES 5 PONG BALLS for hours of crazy beer pong fun.
EXTRA THICK PLASTIC for strength and durability. Scratch and tear resistant.
HOLDS 28 CUPS: 10 cups in each end rack and 4 cups along both sides for socializing.
QUICK & EASY to inflate and deflate so you can get back to partying.
MULTIPLE USES: Doubles as a full size personal pool float.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars158 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
